title: What platforms are supported with Unity Ads?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I want to know if Unity Ads is supported on the target platform for my game.

sections.title: Cause
content: You need to know if the platform or platforms that you are targeting supports our Unity Ads service.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Unity Ads currently only supports iOS and Android:

• iOS version 6 or later
  • Android version 2.3 or later

sections.title: More Information
content: For Android users, Unity Ads currently only supports the Google Play store.
